Npc_Talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Weren't you listening? Fine, I'll go over
it again.
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>I'm sure the two of you can overcome
anything if you work together. Don't worry
about Teba. You two should get going!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Bring me back a nice souvenir, OK, bud?
Talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>I'm thinking about heading over to
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>as a representative
of the Rito.<sp:0:4:0>If Hyrule's not at peace, the Rito aren't
at peace either, right?<sp:0:4:0>I just need to get a couple things
together, and I'll be ready to set out.
Npc_Talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Other than making sure everyone is fed?
Mostly we investigate what the deal is
with this blizzard.<sp:0:4:0>This island-looking thing appeared in the
sky along with the blizzard. It's been
raining down junk on us ever since.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Not only that, we have to deal with these
packs of flying monsters. I've never seen
anything like them.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Most of us are focused on checking out
the mountains themselves, but some are
looking into Rito legends and fables.<sp:0:4:0>We're casting a wide net with this one.
Anything that might be related is
fair game.<sp:0:4:0>You never know where the clue that
breaks the whole thing wide open will
be found, after all.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_01>I wouldn't rule anything out as long as
there's a chance.
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Between the two of you, I bet you could
do anything. And if Teba were here, he'd
say the same.
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Is that... It is! Hey, bud!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I had heard you were missing, but here
you are, looking perfectly healthy to me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><clr:0000>Teba<clr:ffff> was worried about you, you know.
Have you been to see him yet?<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm tempted to go tell him the good news,
but I'm all tied up at the moment.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0>Teba<clr:ffff> should be in <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, which is
just <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here. I'm sure he'd be happy
to get a visit from you.
Npc_Talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Right now, Tulin is with Gesane and
Laissa looking for food at the <clr:0000>Hebra
South Summit cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard hasn't hit the caves as hard,
so you can still find fish and mushrooms
inside them sometimes.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Have you been to see <clr:0000>Teba<clr:ffff> yet?<sp:0:4:0>He's in <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, which is just <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>
of here. I bet he'd love to get a visit
from you.
Talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS>I plan to set out for <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff> as
soon as I'm ready. There must be some
way we Rito can help.
Npc_Talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>We're nearly certain that the source of
this blizzard is above that cloud. If we can
confirm that, it's a good first step.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We don't yet have the supplies to make
the trek up there, but we're chipping
away at the problem, little by little.<sp:0:4:0>Just between you and me, we're thinking
of sending Tulin as our investigator.
You should see him in action.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>His abilities really are something, Link.
He's a better flier and archer than most
of the adults.<sp:0:4:0>And the way he can <clr:0000>create winds at will<clr:ffff>?
That's a trick I've never even heard of
anyone else pulling off.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>The only thing is...with all that skill at his
command, he tends to assume he doesn't
need anyone else backing him up.<sp:0:4:0>And that's gotten him into trouble more
times than I can count.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>Teba and I talk all the time about what he
could accomplish if he could only get rid
of that silly idea.
Npc_Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Teba is protecting the village, where the
children are, so that I can keep things
going here.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Whether it's figuring out the source of
this weird weather or scrounging food day
and night, everyone's pitching in.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But don't feel like you're intruding, bud!
If there's anything you want to know,
you can ask me.
Npc_Talk011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you intend to follow Tulin in this kind
of weather, be prepared before you
head out.
Npc_Talk002: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I'll tell you as much as I know. Ask away.
Npc_Talk012:
The cave they were headed out to is
<clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, up the mountain road past
the cliff out front.
Npc_Talk013:
<snd:TalkPositive>There's a <clr:0000>bonfire<clr:ffff> burning at the <clr:0000>cave's
entrance <clr:ffff>if you need a landmark to find it.
Npc_Talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If there's anything you want to ask me,
shoot. I'll answer if I can.
